import { useState } from "react"; import { useEffect } from "react"; import employeeService from './../service/employeeService'; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; export default function EmployeeDetail() { const token = localStorage.getItem('token') const navigate = useNavigate() const [detail, setDetail] = useState() // useEffect(()=>{ // console.log(token1); // },[]) const employeeDetail = async()=>{ const res = await employeeService.detail() setDetail(res.data) } useEffect(()=>{ employeeDetail() },[token]) const handleLogout = ()=>{ localStorage.removeItem('token') // navigate('/') } return ( <>
